summary: The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.
cast: Hugh Jackman|Kate Beckinsale|Richard Roxburgh|David Wenham|Shuler Hensley|Elena Anaya|Will Kemp|Kevin J. O'Connor|Alun Armstrong|Silvia Colloca|Josie Maran|Tom Fisher|Samuel West|Robbie Coltrane|Stephen Fisher|Dana Morávková|Zuzana Durdinová|Jaroslav Vízner|Marek Vasut|Samantha Sommers|Dorel Mois|Marianna Mois|Laurence Racine|Patrice Wojciechowski|Kacie Borrowman|Ryan James|Martin Klebba|Allison Queal
title: Van Helsing
